items.title: Instant Accounts:
items.description: Create Vercel and Sanity accounts instantly. Get your project environment ready in minutes

items.title: GitHub Integration:
items.description: Connect to your GitHub repository effortlessly. Set up webhooks and streamline your development process

items.title: Easy Deployment:
items.description: Deploy both your studio and frontend seamlessly. Enjoy a smooth transition from setup to live site

items.title: Content and Components:
items.description: Get started with pre-configured content and component sets. Focus on what matters most — creating great content

items.title: Automated Rollout:
items.description: Set up your entire environment with a single command. Save time with our automated deployment scripts

items.title: Visual Editing:
items.description: Utilize our enhanced visual editing tools within the CMS. Create and manage content with a user-friendly interface

content.text: CMS-KIT offers quick and easy setup, allowing you to focus on building valuable features within a scalable, supportive architecture.

items.title: Quick Setup:
items.description: Our Frontend Boilerplate enables you to kickstart your project with minimal effort. Set up a fully functional site in no time

items.title: Automated Deployment:
items.description: Leverage our automated system to deploy your CMS efficiently. Spend less time on setup and more on development.

items.title: CMS Integration:
items.description: Seamless integration with popular CMS platforms and hosting services. Streamline your workflow with built-in connectors.

items.title: Starter Templates:
items.description: Access initial content and component templates to jumpstart your content creation process. Customize as per your needs.

content.seoDescription: An endeavor accumulating the experience and best practices collected at Focus Reactive. The project serves the idea of making Headless CMS-based development accessible, comfortable, and fast.
